Class GuiTimerHelper

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.helpers.GuiTimerHelper
public class GuiTimerHelper extends Object
Helper class for timer logic extracted from GuiController. Contains exact same code, just moved to separate file.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GuiTimerHelper(javafx.scene.text.Text timerText, Consumer<MoveEvent> moveDownCallback)
    Creates a new timer helper.

  • Constructor Details

    • GuiTimerHelper

      public GuiTimerHelper(javafx.scene.text.Text timerText, Consumer<MoveEvent> moveDownCallback)
      Creates a new timer helper.
      Parameters:
      timerText - the text component to display timer (may be null)
      moveDownCallback - callback to execute when auto-drop timer fires

  • Method Details

    • setFallIntervalMs

      public void setFallIntervalMs(int fallIntervalMs)
      Sets the base fall interval in milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      fallIntervalMs - the fall interval in milliseconds

    • setLevelSpeedFactor

      public void setLevelSpeedFactor(double levelSpeedFactor)
      Sets the level speed factor (how much faster each level becomes).
      Parameters:
      levelSpeedFactor - the speed factor (e.g., 0.15 = 15% faster per level)

    • setTimerEnabled

      public void setTimerEnabled(boolean timerEnabled)
      Sets whether the HUD timer is enabled.
      Parameters:
      timerEnabled - true to enable timer display, false to disable

    • getTimeLine

      public javafx.animation.Timeline getTimeLine()
      Gets the auto-drop timeline.
      Returns:
      the timeline for automatic brick dropping

    • startAutoDropTimer

      public void startAutoDropTimer()
      Starts the automatic drop timer that moves bricks down periodically.

    • startHudTimerIfNeeded

      public void startHudTimerIfNeeded()
      Starts the HUD timer if enabled. Displays elapsed time in the timer text component.

    • onLevelChanged

      public void onLevelChanged(int newLevel)
      Updates the auto-drop timer speed based on the new level.
      Parameters:
      newLevel - the new level (affects drop speed)

    • pause

      public void pause()
      Pauses both the auto-drop timer and HUD timer.

    • resume

      public void resume()
      Resumes both the auto-drop timer and HUD timer.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops both the auto-drop timer and HUD timer.
